mean_cn: v. 配药过量，使过分沉溺；  n. 药量过多
mean_en: to take too much of a drug or medicine :to take an overdose of a drug or medicine
word_etyma: over过度，过分+dose剂量→药剂过量
sentence: She tried to overdose on booze and drugs, because the stress from her life was just too much.
sentence_trans: 她试图过量使用酒和药，因为她的生活压力太大了。
